title: Nicola Citro
text:
Nicola Citro (born 27 May 1989) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="Serie%20C">Serie C</a> club <a href="S.S.C.%20Bari">Bari</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> for <a href="Trapani%20Calcio">Trapani</a> on 19 September 2014 in a game against <a href="Carpi%20F.C.%201909">Carpi</a>.
On 17 August 2018, he joined <a href="Venezia%20F.C.">Venezia</a> on a season-long loan. Venezia held a buyout option at the end of the loan.
On 5 October 2020 he signed a two-year contract with <a href="S.S.C.%20Bari">Bari</a>.
